header.description: No header tokens required for this report

rows.description: All data acquisition jobs with device, schema, gateway, interval, status, and runtime metrics

totals.description: No totals required for this report

semantics: All tokens are passthrough or computed. No user-provided filters required. Time-range filtering applies to app_job_runs.started_at and app_gateways.created_at if date parameters are provided at runtime.
transformations: Extract first device table ID from JSON array in app_jobs.tables_json
Convert polling interval from milliseconds to seconds (interval_ms รท 1000)
Aggregate MAX(started_at) from app_job_runs per job_id for last_run_at
Aggregate SUM(count) from app_job_errors_minute per job_id for error_count
LEFT JOIN app_device_tables on extracted device_table_id for schema_id
LEFT JOIN app_devices on device_id for protocol and gateway_id
LEFT JOIN app_gateways on gateway_id for created_at and updated_at timestamps
